name: Disney's Magic Artist Cartoon Maker
storyline: Using Disney's Magic Artist Cartoon Maker, kids can create their own animated cartoon shorts. Design and customize colorful animated sequences, then add music, effects, props, titles, and credits. Design a range of animated shorts, then queue them up, and add a guest star and a bonus Disney short to create a complete show for family and friends.
summary: Disney's Magic Artist Cartoon Maker is a 2002 Disney CD-ROM game featuring Mickey Mouse and his friends.
